meanings.definition: The action of making something that was previously illegal permissible by law.
meanings.sent1: The legalization of marijuana has led to new businesses opening up.
meanings.sent2: The legalization of same-sex marriage was a significant milestone for civil rights.
meanings.sent3: After the legalization of jaywalking, pedestrians were seen crossing the street wherever they pleased.
meanings.sent4: The legalization of gambling turned the city into a bustling hub of activity.
meanings.sent5: The legalization of hunting in the national park caused a surge in wildlife population control measures.

meanings.definition: The process of officially authorizing or approving something.
meanings.sent1: The legalization of the new drug required extensive testing and approval.
meanings.sent2: The legalization of the new policy brought relief to many employees.
meanings.sent3: The legalization of the new fashion trend sparked a frenzy among teenagers.
meanings.sent4: The legalization of the new technology paved the way for its widespread use.
meanings.sent5: The legalization of the new building design set a precedent for future constructions.
